title: Six Deals You Need To Know About In Australia Today
text:
Image: Muzili

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: 75% off portable Bluetooth speakers, 60% off fashion at eBay, cheap board games and more!

1. 75% off Bluetooth speakers: Need a new speaker for music and podcasts on the go? Amazon is selling the Muzili MUSPEAKER001 model for just $16.99 - that's 75% off the RRP. The unit comes with a pair of drivers built-in and an enhanced bass function, plus a two-year warranty. Click here!

2. 91% off PureVPN plans: PureVPN is currently down to just $0.99 per month when you sign up to a 12 month contract (total spend = $11.88). That's a massive saving of 91%! Click here.

3. Beats audio clearance: Catch has knocked up to 33% off a range of Beats audio gear including Studio3 headphones, PowerBeats earbuds and portable speaker jobbies. Click here!

4. Cheap Monopoly Cheaters Edition: Hasbro's Monopoly Cheaters Edition is currently going for $23.99 on eBay - down from $39.99. That's over 40% off! To get the full discount, use the code 'POLLEN20' at checkout. (Not into Monopoly? You can find additional board game deals on eBay's dedicated portal.) Click here!

5. 60% off fashion at eBay: eBay is having a big clearance sale on fashion items with up to 60% off a range of popular brands including Scotch & Soda, North Sails, Fossil and more. To get the deal, use the discount code 'PLUME' at checkout. Click here!

6. Cheap 90Mbps NBN: NBN 100 plans tend to max out at around 80MBps during peak usage times. Superloop just upped the ante with a guaranteed evening speed of 90Mbps. You can also get one month free when you use the discount code 'SLNBN'. Here are the details!

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: 75% off portable Bluetooth speakers, 60% off fashion at eBay, cheap board games and more!...
